channel.title: Exusia 718 - Spawn/Economy Server [Officially Open on New years!]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/bec5fk.png[/img][/center] [center]Exusia 718 is a Spawn/Economy server. Meaning, in order to spawn items you must have the money for it.[/center]
[center]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center] [center]Exusia 718 is [size=18pt]ONLINE[/size] right now! Come check it out! We will be hosting events and the first few playing will receive a mystery box! [/center]
[center][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ztks94.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2wcjwiu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ibysk4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/16by6mv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/16by6mv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/5k1tty.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/mc44eg.png[/img][/center]
[center]This server is based mainly on pvp, however we have included all skills as trainable for those who would like to skill rather than pk, and for those people who enjoy PvM'ing many bosses are also available such as Nex, GWD bosses and more![/center]
[color=blue][size=12pt][center][u][b]Main Content and Features[/b][/u][/center] [center]Lobby Login Pk Point Shop Vote Point Shop Spawn Economy Buy and Sell item commands Bossing Gambling Safe Pk with random drops Dangerous Pk with working drops Unique Pk teleport interface Skilling Login and Pk [/center]
[center]Here is a link to our website where you can keep up to date with all the latest news on the server and introduce yourself if you plan to play![/center] [center]-Website- http://exusiapk.com -Forums- http://exusiapk.com/forums -Webclient- http://exusiapk.com/play.html -Vote- http://exusiapk.com/vote -Download- https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/3od9u8jookp8sn0/Exusia.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAH0t0uLLJU11rKq4wconpzTX9-PDC2GRgEHt7SR40Y5Bg
[/center]

item.title: Exusia 718 - Spawn/Economy Server [Officially Open on New years!]
item.dc:creator: @Exusia Exusia
item.description:
@Exusia wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Exusia 718 is a Spawn/Economy server. Meaning, in order to spawn items you must have the money for it.[/center]

[center]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
[center]Exusia 718 is [size=18pt]ONLINE[/size] right now! Come check it out!
We will be hosting events and the first few playing will receive a mystery box!
[/center]

[center]





[/center]

[center]This server is based mainly on pvp, however we have included all skills as trainable for those who would like to skill rather than pk, and for those people who enjoy PvMâ€™ing many bosses are also available such as Nex, GWD bosses and more![/center]

[color=blue][size=12pt][center]Main Content and Features[/center]
